message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for a price of $12,000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a competitive price. I'm confident you'll love it!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000.  How about we split the difference at $11,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to spend closer to $10,000, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to add a small premium for the value I bring to the table. How about we try $11,500?
